content: this earwarmer is worked in the round as a tube and then the ends are sewn together alternately this piece can be worked flat by casting on 2 extra stitches and then seamed into a tube before sewing the ends together slip_stitch surface crochet is used to add the vertical lines yarn amounts will be enough to make all three color combinations shown sizes child adult s adult m adult l choose a size 1-2 smaller than actual head circumference finished measurements circumference 18 19 20 21 width 4½ materials premier® yarns premier basix® dk 100% acrylic 3 5oz/100g 306yds/280m c1 1142-63 holly 1 ball c2 1142-48 brown black 1 ball c3 1142-60 sage 1 ball needle us size 6 4 mm set of dpns or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle locking stitch markers us size g-6 4mm crochet hook gauge 22 sts x 28 rnds = 4 in st st save time check your gauge skills/techniques used in this pattern knit and purl stitches knitting small circumferences in the round changing colors slip_stitch surface crochet seaming with whipstitch
